name: Kaiser of Singularity
summary:
A fourth-year expelled student returns to his hometown, hoping to reconnect with old friends.
While hacking into the abyss of the unconscious, he will search for answers to numerous questions: how to overcome alienation, how to restore the course of time, and why this world is imprisoned either in the past or in somebody else's future.
Surveillance cameras, protective rituals, videotapes with old films, secret networks outside the networks, the search for oneself and one's place in reality.
What of this is real and what is psychosis which resulted from a man-made disaster?
